services.title: Unarmed Security Guards
services.description: Trained personnel who provide surveillance, access control, and patrolling to prevent theft, vandalism, and unauthorized entry

services.title: Armed Security Guards
services.description: Licensed professionals equipped with firearms for high-risk environments like banks, jewelry stores, and VIP protection

services.title: Event Security Services
services.description: Specialized security for events, including crowd management, access control, and emergency response to ensure safety and order

services.title: Corporate Security Services
services.description: Comprehensive security solutions for businesses, including risk assessment, surveillance systems, and employee safety protocols

services.title: Industrial & Warehouse Security
services.description: Security services tailored for industrial sites and warehouses, focusing on asset protection, inventory control, and safety compliance

services.title: Residential Security Services
services.description: Security solutions for residential areas, including neighborhood watch programs, patrols, and alarm systems to enhance community safety

services.title: VIP & Executive Protection
services.description: Personalized security for high-profile individuals, including bodyguards, secure transportation, and risk management to ensure personal safety

services.title: Bank & Financial Institution Security
services.description: Specialized security for banks and financial institutions, focusing on cash handling, fraud prevention, and emergency response protocols

services.title: CCTV & Surveillance Monitoring
services.description: Installation and monitoring of CCTV systems to enhance security, deter crime, and provide real-time surveillance for various environments

services.title: Mobile Patrol Services
services.description: Regular patrols by security personnel in marked vehicles to deter crime, provide a visible security presence, and respond to incidents

services.title: Industrial & Construction Site Security
services.description: Security services for industrial and construction sites, focusing on asset protection, site access control, and safety compliance

services.title: Cash-in-Transit (CIT) Services
services.description: Secure transportation of cash and valuables, including armored vehicles and trained personnel to ensure safe delivery
